item.title: Where would i put this code to make it work?
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

ok i have devolution source. i am trying to add slayer, i did some research and found this code :

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1832) { if (playerLevel[18] >= 40) { addSkillXP(500, 18); slayer = true; } else { slayer = false; sendMessage( "You need a slayer level of 40 to attack cave bugs."); }

but where in client.java would i add it? please help.

Read full topic
